text: a l laoh min bandaoy aoy banda anak del mean chomnue sthetnow leu avei del puok anak mean noh te louhtrate trong ban beng chek aoy dach pi knea rveang brakear akrak ning brakear la . haey a l laoh ka a minban leatatradeang aoy puok anak nouv brakear athrkambang der . kabonde a l laoh chreusareusa knongchamnaom anakneasar robsa trong champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea( aoy doeng nouv athrkambang) . dau che neah chaur puok anak mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning banda anakneasar robsa trong choh . haey brasenbae puok anak mean chomnue ning kaotakhlach a l laoh noh puok anak nung ttuol ban phalbony da mha thomtheng cheaminkhan
